bukkitrunnablehelper.interfaces

Interface Repeatable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Plannable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConditionalRepeatable, TimedRepeatable

    public interface Repeatable
extends Plannable
    Created by Pieter on 25/06/2015.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDelayTicks()
      Returns the amount of ticks before repeat() method of this Repeatable is called.
      void repeat()
      The method that will be called periodically with an interval of getDelayTicks().

      • Methods inherited from interface bukkitrunnablehelper.interfaces.Plannable

        timeout

    • Method Detail

      • getDelayTicks

        int getDelayTicks()
        Returns the amount of ticks before repeat() method of this Repeatable is called.
        Returns:
        An integer with the amount of ticks between every repetition.

      • repeat

        void repeat()
        The method that will be called periodically with an interval of getDelayTicks().
